channel.title: Posts on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Personal Blog

item.title: Travels: India
item.description: Life in India Lots of struggle initially, unemployed for a year! Too many people! Bad infrastructure, overall I had horrible experience getting used to the place ngl However, right now, I’m okay cool

item.title: Travels: Canada
item.description: Life in Canada Pretty anxiety inducing, sometimes lonely, overall great However, I got into trouble, and I didn’t really like it there. I knew it was just a temp thing till I get my citizenship and then I would be back in the US. However, I didn’t really want to go through with it so I decided to move to India. okay

item.title: Travels: USA
item.description: Life in the US Most importantly, I learned how to support myself, and everything I needed to know to hone my craft and make a living. Literally nowhere else in the world would I have been able to learn this so well ( to the extent/degree/quality ) of I was taught both in university and during my employment there. The only issue is the immigration system, I didn’t really like it.
